node.detail_zh: 患者曾乘坐「鑽石公主號」郵輪，後在火炭駿洋邨接受隔離。 2 月 22 日因發燒被送往伊利沙伯醫院。 2 月 23 日確診。
node.detail_en: The patient had been aboard the Diamond Princess cruise ship and was then put in quarantine in Chun Yeung Estate, Fo Tan after returning to Hong Kong. He developed a fever on Feb 22 and was sent to Queen Elizabeth Hospital. He tested positive for coronavirus on Feb 23.

groups.description_zh: 鑽石公主號首名患者是一名 80 歲香港老翁於 2020 年 2 月 1 日確診，他於 1 月 25 日在香港啟德郵輪碼頭上岸。香港政府於 2 月 19 及 21 日安排共 3 架國泰航空包機載回船上沒有確診的香港居民。所有相關人士抵港後被送往駿洋邨隔離中心隔離 14 日。
groups.description_en: A 80 years old man was the first confirmed case of Diamond Princess, having returned to HK on Jan 25 and been diagnosed on Feb 1. HK Government provided 3 flights for asymptomatic HK residents to return to HK on Mar 19 & 21. All passengers of Diamond Princess were under compulsory quarantine in Chun Yeung Estate.

node.remarks_zh: 乘坐包機於 2 月 20 日返港，於同日出現發燒及咳，22 日被送往伊利沙伯醫院求醫
node.remarks_en: Returned to Hong Kong by a chartered flight on Feb 20 and developed fever and cough on the same day. The patient was sent to Queen Elizabeth Hospital on Feb 22.
